花.definition: flower; blossom; CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]; fancy pattern; florid; to spend (money, time); (coll.) lecherous; lustful

花好月圓.definition: lit. lovely flowers, round moon (idiom); fig. everything is wonderful; perfect happiness; conjugal bliss

花彩雀鶯.definition: (bird species of China) white-browed tit-warbler (Leptopoecile sophiae)

花心思.definition: to think through; to invest effort in thinking about; to consider thoroughly

花押.definition: signature (in grass-style writing); symbol used in place of a signature (on a document, contract etc)

花招.definition: trick; maneuver; razzle-dazzle; (martial arts) fancy move; flourish

花旦.definition: role of vivacious young female in Chinese opera
